ResearchProjectDef.label: Knowledge
ResearchProjectDef.description: You will learn about Mofy and be able to create basic weapons and materials that Mofy's use in building.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Little Blacksmith
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will be possible to create various tools adapted to small-sized races.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blacksmith Instruction
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will be possible to create an instruction board that will raise the quality of construction and item production to a higher level.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Alternate Plan
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how you can create a Mofu Stone with certain materials as an emergency alternative.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cold Materials
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mofu Stone and high density ice will be combined to create Mofu Hail which can be used as a beautiful stone material.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Explosive Demolition
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables the creation of simple structure, anti-building bombs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Smart Mortar
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mofu stones can be used to create mortars that can bombard large areas.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Freeze Bomb
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will be able to create bombs that disperse very cold gases, which are harmful to living organisms. Exposure to too much gas at one time causes the whole body to freeze.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Costumes
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will allow you to create Mofy outfits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wall Attachment
ResearchProjectDef.description: It will be possible to create attachments that can be mounted on the surrounding walls to achieve the desired effect. All attachments are indiscriminately effective and should be handled with care.
